In 2013, Garnett took part in a joint exhibition with her partner, photographer Tom Craig (photographer), at the Vogue Festival in London."Louis Vuitton To Stage Vogue Festival Photography Exhibition" Vogue. Retrieved 30 July 2013."The Hot List: April Edition" Nouse. Retrieved 5 August 2013.
